WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT DEPT_CD , DEPT_NM , UPP_DEPT_CD , DEPT_CHRGR_ID, 1 AS LEVEL FROM TB_DEPT WHERE UPP_DEPT_CD IS NULL AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT B.DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_NM , B.UPP_DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_CHRGR_ID, C.LEVEL + 1 AS LEVEL FROM TB_DEPT B INNER JOIN CTE C ON B.UPP_DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_CD ) SELECT DEPT_CD AS deptCd , DEPT_NM AS deptNm , DEPT_CHRGR_ID AS deptChrgrId , UPP_DEPT_CD AS uppDeptCd FROM CTE WHERE 1=1
AND (DEPT_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.searchText}, '%') OR DEPT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.searchText}, '%') )
ORDER BY DEPT_CD

WITH RECURSIVE CTE (dept_cd, dept_nm, upp_dept_cd, sort_odr) AS ( SELECT T1.dept_cd, T1.dept_nm, IFNULL(T1.upp_dept_cd,'#') upp_dept_cd, T1.sort_odr FROM TB_DEPT T1 WHERE upp_dept_cd IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT T2.dept_cd, T2.dept_nm, T2.upp_dept_cd, T2.sort_odr FROM TB_DEPT T2 INNER JOIN CTE ON T2.upp_dept_cd = CTE.dept_cd ) SELECT CTE.dept_cd AS id, CTE.dept_nm AS text, CTE.sort_odr AS depth, CTE.upp_dept_cd AS parent FROM CTE WHERE 1=1
AND LENGTH(dept_cd) < 7
ORDER BY CTE.dept_cd, CTE.sort_odr

SELECT USER_ID AS userId , USER_PW AS userPw , DEPT_CD AS deptCd , (SELECT B.DEPT_NM FROM TB_DEPT B WHERE B.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD) AS deptNm , USER_NM AS userNm , EMAIL AS email , TELNO AS telno , SEX AS sex , USE_YN AS useYn , REGR AS regr , REGDT AS regdt , UPDR AS updr , UPDT AS updt ,'' as chk FROM TB_USER A WHERE 1=1
AND (USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.searchText}, '%') OR USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.searchText}, '%') )
ORDER BY DEPT_CD

SELECT USER_ID AS userId , USER_PW AS userPw , DEPT_CD AS deptCd , (SELECT B.DEPT_NM FROM TB_DEPT B WHERE B.DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD) AS deptNm , USER_NM AS userNm , EMAIL AS email , TELNO AS telno , SEX AS sex , USE_YN AS useYn , REGR AS regr , REGDT AS regdt , UPDR AS updr , UPDT AS updt ,'' as chk FROM TB_USER A WHERE 1=1
AND ${params.searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.searchText}, '%')
AND ${params.searchType2} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.searchText2}, '%')
ORDER BY DEPT_CD

SELECT A.* , C.code_nm AS asetTypeNm1 , D.code_nm AS asetTypeNm2 , E.code_nm AS asetTypeNm3 , F.dept_nm AS bizDeptNm , G.dept_nm AS deptNm , H.code_nm AS asetStusNm , I.code_nm AS bsplcNm , J.code_nm AS buldNm , K.code_nm AS floorNm FROM ( SELECT aset_no AS asetNo , aset_nm AS asetNm , aset_type1 AS asetType1 , aset_type2 AS asetType2 , aset_type3 AS asetType3 , mftco AS mftco , model AS model , sn AS sn , biz_dept_cd AS bizDeptCd , A.dept_cd AS deptCd , chrgr AS chrgr , B.user_nm AS chrgr_nm , bsplc AS bsplc , buld AS buld , floor AS floor , loc AS loc , exp_dept_cd AS expDeptCd , exp_acct AS expAcct , dur_year AS durYear , acq_prc AS acqPrc , sval_prc AS svalPrc , dprc_prc AS dprcPrc , acq_dt AS acqDt , aset_out_book_yn AS asetOutBookYn , aset_stus AS asetStus , A.updr AS updr , up_dt AS upDt , A.regr AS regr , reg_dt AS regDt , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.aset_no) AS rn FROM tb_aset_mas A INNER JOIN tb_user B ON B.user_id = A.chrgr WHERE 1=1
AND ( aset_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.asetNo}, '%'))
AND ( reg_dt between #{params.fromDate} and #{params.toDate} )
AND ( aset_type1 = #{params.asetType1} )
AND ( aset_type2 = #{params.asetType2} )
AND ( aset_type3 = #{params.asetType3} )
AND ( biz_dept_cd = #{params.deptCd1} )
AND ( dept_cd = #{params.deptCd2} )
AND ( chrgr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.chrgr}, '%'))
AND ( aset_stus = #{params.reqStus} )
) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_code C ON C.code_grp_id = 'AS_CLASS' AND A.asetType1 = C.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_code D ON D.code_grp_id = 'AS_CLASS' AND A.asetType2 = D.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_code E ON E.code_grp_id = 'AS_CLASS' AND A.asetType3 = E.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_dept F ON A.bizDeptCd = F.dept_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_dept G ON A.deptCd = G.dept_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_code H ON H.code_grp_id = 'AS_STATUS' AND A.asetStus = H.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_code I ON I.code_grp_id = 'SITE' AND A.bsplc = I.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_code J ON J.code_grp_id = 'BUILDING' AND A.buld = J.code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_code K ON K.code_grp_id = 'FLOOR' AND A.floor = K.code_id WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY asetNo DESC
